name: Rung Card Game Court Piece
description:
Rung Card Game (Court Piece) is a great game for cards lovers. Rung Card Game (Coat Piece) is very addictive and cards loving game. Commonly played in Pakistan,India,Bangladesh,England and United States of America.
Game constituent of two pair of players. Main aim is to get maximum tricks to win the game. Trump suit will be selected on the beginning of game. Trump suit in Rang Card Game (Court Piece) is used to keep you senior.
The major aim is to get maximum tricks to win the game. And the Looser will be the one who will fail to get maximum tricks.
In Pakistan,India and Bangladesh game used to call as Rang (Rung). While in European or rest of the world game is known as Coat/Court Piece.
Rung Card Game is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its huge amount of challenges.

Game Features:
Great Graphics.
Great Sound effects.
Advanced AI.
Deluxe Game.

Its a South Asian traditional game.
The one who will earn maximum tricks will be the winner. And the one who will fail to get minimum 7 tricks will be a looser.
